title: The Real Life Golden Girls
description:
Three English grandmothers decide to quarantine together. Their biggest concern? How much white wine they have in storage. A conversation featuring Nikki’s friend, Mr. Malone.

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

---
